channel.title: TrisidiaX V3 [317 PI] The Final Release! Fixed! l Video!
channel.description:
[center][b]TrisidiaX V3 [317 PI] Fixed Release!
Credit:TrisidiaX Member
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=568101
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=32EtJ1svSdw&feature=c4-overview&list=UU_Cij1XyY85PBkxm8zUe_dA[/youtube]
Credits: Haviland4 - 0% InsidiaX- `10% ME/Trisidia- 70% Ajmcbsat - 5% Lexi - 5% Kings - 5% Yorben- 5%
i have only fixed & Changed
Changed all ip address to 127.0.0.1 Changed all shops & Fixed Trade Bug Changed the objects Fixed a dupe glitch Fixed couple of client loading errors
Only 1 last problem is the Cache Downloading System! I added the trisidiaX Cache to the package.rar files! Maybe u could figure this out!
Download: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/71877387/Package.rar
Notice: This was coded by Team TrisidiaX, If you use this source please Give Trisidia, and TrisidiaX Credit.
Hope you enjoy my Fixed Release![/b][/center]

item.title: TrisidiaX V3 [317 PI] The Final Release! Fixed! l Video!
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Driman Rune:

THIS ISN’T WORTH A release.

You fix it, then judge him. If not then don’t be one of those dicks that put people down. Mopar is made by giving people, no matter how big or little.

item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“haviland4, post:10, topic:529402”][quote author=iz3 legend link=topic=648156.msg4359922#msg4359922 date=1378502243]

THIS ISN’T WORTH A release.

I would agree if it was anyone but you, you have absolutely no grounds to criticize anyone else after the code you’ve been posting. Your signature is a perfect example of this. Any contribution is welcome, and so far he has demonstrated more intelligence and self control then you ever have.
[/quote]

:mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:[/quote]
Why are you mad? He was complementing you by saying you have better self-control! I think you read it wrong…

[quote=“iz3 legend, post:9, topic:529402”][quote author=Driman Rune link=topic=648156.msg4359914#msg4359914 date=1378500087]
THIS ISN’T WORTH A release.
[/quote]

I would agree if it was anyone but you, you have absolutely no grounds to criticize anyone else after the code you’ve been posting. Your signature is a perfect example of this. Any contribution is welcome, and so far he has demonstrated more intelligence and self control then you ever have.[/quote]
